scope_and_work_type: business analysis and senior user support
teaming_and_delivery: adherence to federal IT governance guidelines
facilitation of project activities (training, testing, go-live, post-go-live support)
organization and participation in required meetings
management and configuration control of project documentation and source code
Agile and IT Core support teams
rapid and flexible response to change
delivery of scheduled and ad-hoc reports
performance_and_quality: continuous evaluation of service delivery performance
secure, scalable, and mission-driven IT modernization
improved response time from weeks to 12 hours
thorough and complete plans with verification checklists
increased first-call resolution rate from 25% to 75%
alignment with agency objectives and compliance mandates
compliance_and_standards: Office of Inspector General (OIG) management alerts
contract_strategy: Our proven program and project management adheres to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK) and Agile methodologies with the execution of Capabilities Maturity Model Integration (CMMI) DEV Maturity Level 3 (ML3) for process standardization, International Organization for Standardization (ISO) 9001:2015 for Quality Management, ISO 20000:2018 for Service Delivery, and ISO 27001:2022 for Security Management.

contract_identification.contract_name: Enforcement Systems Operations and Maintenance Support Services (ESOMSS)

client_and_agency.client: Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)

scope_and_work_type: Use of open-source software and technologies
Providing DHS support for PTA, PIA, SORN, and other privacy compliance documentation
Ensuring ICE ERO systems maintain privacy of PII data
Application development using Java and Agile processes
Forms and Correspondence Systems for Users
Agile DME and O&M support of 25 user-centric, mission-critical enterprise ICE Enforcement Systems running more than 40 applications operated within AWS GovCloud East and West
teaming_and_delivery: Staffed over 100 personnel within 60 days of award
Supporting multiple value streams and business units
5 Agile DevSecOps teams with 13 FTEs per team
performance_and_quality: Automated processes to improve data quality and outcomes
Performing security control design and annual assessment, assessing DHS 4300A Sensitive Systems policies and requirements, and NIST 800-53 controls
Complying with FAR and HSAR privacy regulations
Following ICE's System Lifecycle Management (SLM) process, ICE SLM Handbook, ICE Agile/DevOps Playbook, and ICE Web Standards and Guidelines
Implemented digital workflow for forms and correspondence
compliance_and_standards: Maintained security posture and compliance with DHS 4300A, NIST 800-53
Ensured FDCC/USGCB compliance for software installations

sources: DOS INR Intelligence Development and Enterprise Applications 09-2024.docx
scope_and_work_type: Harmonia provides the DOS INR and other Department intelligence stakeholders with a comprehensive IT solution design and development. We identify, analyze, integrate, deploy, and maintain technical capabilities essential for establishing the full suite of enterprise applications to meet the current and evolving INR diplomatic and intelligence mission needs. Our services encompass agile software development, program risk and requirements management, and IT operations services to operate and maintain both existing and newly integrated technology solutions.
